function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 as a global threat","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus, leading to widespread illness and death","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict containment measures, widespread testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Biotechnology for vaccine development, diagnostic testing, and wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and international agencies"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in untreated wastewater","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and potential transmission to humans through water sources","Mitigation":"Implementation of optimized and standardized protocols for detection and quantification of the virus in wastewater, and proper wastewater treatment processes","Technologies":"Water and wastewater testing technologies, including WBE (wastewater-based epidemiology)","People":"Communities living near water sources, wastewater treatment workers, and public health officials","Owner":"Water and sanitation authorities, public health agencies, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Survival of COVID-19 in sewage and wastewater","Impact":"Potential for transmission of the virus through aerosol formation during wastewater treatment, posing a risk to workers and nearby communities","Mitigation":"Detailed study of the survival of COVID-19 in sewage, implementation of appropriate safety measures during wastewater treatment, and regular monitoring of aerosol formation","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies, aerosol monitoring equipment, and personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Wastewater treatment workers, adjacent communities, and researchers","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, public health agencies, and research institutions"}]}
